name: Tank (Improve)
description:
The Control Guide Is The Same.

But Be Very Careful Of Using The Game Pad Controllers It Will Get Complicated As Long You Can Practicing.

Left-Analog Stick - Movement The Tank.

Right-Analog Stick - Movement The Tank Cannon. (Like Move The Angle Carefully)

Right-Shoulder Trigger - Shooting.

I'm Sorry About That Players I Fixed The Shooting The Right-Shoulder Trigger Now It Can Shoot The Missile For The White Tank.
